titles: Some of the many fallacies of William Penn detected in a paper called Gospel truths signed by him and three more at Dublin, the 4th of the 3d month, 1698, and in his late book called A defence of Gospel truths, against the exceptions of the B. of Cork's testimony concerning that paper : with some remarks on W.P., his unfair and unjust treatment of him : to which is added a synopsis or short view of W. Penn's deism, collected out of his book called A defense of the general rule of faith, &c. / by George Keith.
author: Keith, George, 1639?-1716.
notes: Running title: The fallacies of William Penn in his Gospel truths, &c. detected.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
keywords: Penn, William, 1644-1718. --  Defense of Gospel truths.
Penn, William, 1644-1718. --  Defense of the general rule of faith.
